rooms.name: Living Area & Open Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A combined space with an art deco design aesthetic, featuring open layout for seamless transition between the living area and kitchen. Includes built-in cabinetry and modern fixtures in a classic art deco style.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Elegant bedroom with art deco accents, ample natural light from north-facing windows, and a dedicated walk-in closet. The room follows Vastu principles by positioning the bed in the southern corner to promote good energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom featuring art deco elements and natural light with north-facing windows for improved Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom designed to adhere to art deco style, ensuring functional space while maintaining balance as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet and well-lit library area integrated within the living space. Features built-in shelves along one wall with a north-facing window to enhance concentration and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional guest bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom, designed with art deco fixtures and efficient space planning. Placement ensures positive energy flow.

openings.description: Primary entrance facing north, ensuring optimum light and positive energy according to Vastu principles. The entrance is accentuated with art deco detailing.
